title: Ward SKin
body: I just got a knew ward skin and it wont let me change into it. Any help?

replies.body: There's a visual display issue right now where some ward skins can't be selected, even though it's unlocked on the account.  We have no eta on a fix, but updated will be provided at our[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I hope that helps clear things up!
